summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3578, for the improvement of East 51st Street, from a connection with existing sewer on Ravenna Avenue to alley in block 14, Ravenna Springs Park Supplemental Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 44210, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
